<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Plants for Phoenix Gardens</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            background-color: #f4f4f4;
            text-align: center;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 20px;
        }

        h1 {
            font-size: 36px;
            color: #2c3e50;
        }

        p {
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #34495e;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }

        .grid-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 20px;
            justify-items: center;
        }

        .item {
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            padding: 10px;
            background-color: white;
            transition: transform 0.2s;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .item:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05);
        }

        img {
            width: 100%;
            height: auto;
            max-width: 200px;
            object-fit: cover;
            border: 2px solid black; /* Added thin black border */
        }

        h3 {
            font-size: 18px;
            color: #333;
        }

        /* Responsive layout for smaller screens */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .grid-container {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
        }

        @media (max-width: 480px) {
            .grid-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <h1>Plants for Phoenix Gardens</h1>
    <p>Welcome to our guide on plants that thrive in the Phoenix area! Here, you'll discover a variety of plants perfectly suited to the unique desert climate. Click on each image to explore more about how to grow, care for, and enjoy these resilient plants in your garden.</p>

    <div class="grid-container">
        <div class="item">
            <a href="blog/item1.html">
                <img src="images/item1.jpg" alt="Item 1">

            </a>
        </div>

        <div class="item">
            <a href="blog/item2.html">
                <img src="images/item2.jpg" alt="Item 2">
                <h3>Plant 2</h3>
            </a>
        </div>

        <div class="item">
            <a href="blog/item3.html">
                <img src="images/item3.jpg" alt="Item 3">
                <h3>Plant 3</h3>
            </a>
        </div>

        <div class="item">
            <a href="blog/item4.html">
                <img src="images/item4.jpg" alt="Item 4">
                <h3>Plant 4</h3>
            </a>
        </div>

        <div class="item">
            <a href="blog/item5.html">
                <img src="images/item5.jpg" alt="Item 5">

</body>
</html>
